name: Kung Fu Up Street Fighting
description:
Kung Fu Up Street Fighting - Enter in the world of fighting and overcome your rivals dead or alive in fighting of games 2018. Challenge the ultimate Kung, try different combo fighting styles, punch all of your enemies and kick out all other super fighters in these fighters of street 3d. You will take smooth and intuitive control system in fighting of games 3d.
Features:
• Realistic kung fighting
• Fighting skills like punch on mouth, combo attack and action jump
• Win or Die kung Fu gameplay mode
• Attractive and realistic boxing of games 2018
• Stunning fighting game addictive environment
